phase_context: Final QC phase before bid documents. All design work should be complete, specifications finalized, and documents ready for bidding. Focus on completeness, consistency, and bid-readiness.
what_should_exist: Final utility design with all details

section_guidance.GENERAL REVIEW / ALL SHEETS: Final QC check on all sheets. Verify technician initials, boring logs, sheet numbering, and that all notes match municipal requirements.
section_guidance.UTILITIES & STRUCTURES: Final verification of all utility design. Confirm separations, inverts, rim elevations, and pipe slopes. All structures should have complete callouts.
section_guidance.CROSS SECTIONS & ALIGNMENT: Verify final pavement sections, K values, and superelevation. HMA table should be complete and match typical sections.
section_guidance.ADA & ACCESSIBILITY: Verify running slopes are less than 5%. Check handrail requirements if applicable. Confirm non-motorized paths meet AASHTO guidelines.
section_guidance.GRADING & MOT: Final grading review including ADA routes, trip hazards, and drainage. MOT plan should be complete with owner-approved phasing.
section_guidance.TRAFFIC & EROSION CONTROL: Final SESC plan with quantities. SWPPP complete. All details match local ordinances.
section_guidance.GENERAL CHECKS: Final spell check, sheet index verification, and profile band elevations.
section_guidance.CALCULATIONS: All calculations should be complete and reviewed. No outstanding concerns from geotechnical report.
section_guidance.COST ESTIMATES: Final quantities verified against plans. Pay items match specifications. Unit prices current and reasonable.
section_guidance.PERMITS: All required permits submitted. Verify copies included in bid documents.
section_guidance.SPECIFICATIONS: Complete specification review. Verify all section numbers, client names, dates, and bid requirements are correct.

example_evaluations.item_text: Is running slope < 5%, and ramps identified with proper slopes/handrails (if applicable)?
example_evaluations.comment: ADA ramp at NE corner of Main St/Oak Ave intersection shows 5.2% running slope on detail D-4. Maximum allowed is 5.0%. Revise grading to achieve compliant slope.

example_evaluations.item_text: Check Rim elevations are correct and listed # of structures reviewed in comments
example_evaluations.comment: All 24 manholes verified with rim elevations matching profiles. Inverts and pipe slopes labeled. Structures MH-1 through MH-24 reviewed.
Specification 00410.6.01 shows substantial completion date of 11/15/2025 but plan cover sheet shows 10/31/2025. Dates must match across all documents.
Liquidated damages set at $500/day in specification 00520.4.03. Amount is reasonable for project scope and matches contract requirements.

example_evaluations.item_text: Provide final Maintenance of Traffic plan. Has phasing been approved by owner?
example_evaluations.comment: MOT plan complete on sheets M-1 through M-3 showing three-phase approach. Unable to verify owner approval from plan documents. PM should confirm phasing was approved in writing.

pass_criteria: Item is complete, accurate, and ready for bid documents. Meets all applicable standards and specifications.
fail_criteria: Item has errors, inconsistencies, or missing information that must be corrected before bid release.
review_criteria: Only use when verification requires owner approval documentation or external confirmation not visible on plans.
